narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Evergreen Recovery is a Counselor, Addiction (Substance Use Disorder) provider based in Saint Paul, MN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $47.3M in Medicaid payments across 431K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $47.3M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
